languages.text: Чемпионы арены, Кровавые прозелиты, вступили в Анатомическую оперу по одним им ведомым причинам. Тервантьяс порекомендовал Вольному Торговцу пойти и как следует рассмотреть их — на арене Губительной жажды такого шанса может не быть.

The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.
languages.original_text: Чемпионы арены, Кровавые прозелиты, вступили в Анатомическую оперу по одним им ведомым причинам. Тервантьяс порекомендовал Вольному Торговцу пойти и как следует рассмотреть их — на арене Губительной жажды такого шанса может не быть.

traits.locale_text: The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.

The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.

The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.

languages.text: 竞技场的冠军“血腥叛党”出现在了解剖歌剧院中，至于他们为什么会来，只有他们自己清楚。特万提亚斯建议行商浪人好好观察他们，毕竟，一旦走进了“致命饥渴”教派的竞技场里，就再也不会有这样的机会了。
languages.original_text: The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.

traits.locale_text: 竞技场的冠军“血腥叛党”出现在了解剖歌剧院中，至于他们为什么会来，只有他们自己清楚。特万提亚斯建议行商浪人好好观察他们，毕竟，一旦走进了“致命饥渴”教派的竞技场里，就再也不会有这样的机会了。

languages.text: Les champions de l'arène, les Prosélytes sanglants, sont entrés dans l'Opéra anatomique pour des raisons connues d'eux seuls. Tervantias a conseillé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} de les observer de près, car {mf|il|elle} n'en aura sûrement pas l'occasion dans l'arène de la Soif Fatale.
languages.original_text: The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.

traits.locale_text: Les champions de l'arène, les Prosélytes Entachés de sang, sont entrés dans l'Opéra anatomique pour des raisons connues d'eux seuls. Tervantias a conseillé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} de les observer de près, car {mf|il|elle} n'en aura sûrement pas l'occasion dans l'arène de la Soif Fatale.

languages.text: Los campeones de la arena, los Prosélitos Ensangrentados, han entrado en la Ópera Anatómica por motivos que solo ellos conocen. Tervantias sugiere a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que les eche un vistazo, ya que probablemente no tenga ocasión de hacerlo en la arena de la Sed Letal.
languages.original_text: The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.

traits.locale_text: Los campeones de la arena, los Prosélitos Ensangrentados, han entrado en la Ópera Anatómica por motivos que solo ellos conocen. Tervantias sugiere a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que les eche un vistazo, ya que probablemente no tenga ocasión de hacerlo en la arena de la Sed Letal.

languages.text: アリーナのチャンピオン、血まみれの改宗者たちが何らかの目的でアナトミカル・オペラに入ってきた。テルヴァンティアスは自由開拓者に彼らをよく見ておくよう助言する。とはいえ、宿命の渇きのアリーナではそのようなチャンスはめぐって来ないだろう。
languages.original_text: The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.

traits.locale_text: アリーナのチャンピオン、血まみれの改宗者たちが何らかの目的でアナトミカル・オペラに入ってきた。テルヴァンティアスは自由開拓者に彼らをよく見ておくよう助言する。とはいえ、宿命の渇きのアリーナではそのようなチャンスはめぐって来ないだろう。

languages.text: Die Meister der Arena, die Blutbefleckten Proselyten, sind aus Gründen in die Anatomische Oper gekommen, die nur ihnen selbst bekannt sind. Tervantias hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} geraten, sie sich gut anzusehen — eine solche Gelegenheit bietet sich in der Arena des Fatalen Dursts vielleicht nicht.
languages.original_text: The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.

traits.locale_text: Die Meister der Arena, die Blutbefleckten Proselyten, sind aus Gründen in die Anatomische Oper gekommen, die nur ihnen selbst bekannt sind. Tervantias hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} geraten, sie sich gut anzusehen — eine solche Gelegenheit bietet sich in der Arena des Fatalen Dursts vielleicht nicht.

languages.text: Arenanın şampiyonları olan Kızıl Zındıklar, Anatomi Operası'na sadece kendilerinin bildikleri bir sebeple giriş yaptı. Tervantias, Hür Tacir'e onlara alıcı gözle bakmasını tavsiye etti. Ölüme Susamışlığın Arenası'nda bu şansa erişemeyebileceğini söyledi.
languages.original_text: The champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes, have entered the Anatomical Opera for reasons known only to themselves. Tervantias has advised the Rogue Trader to take a good look at them — such a chance may not present itself in the Fatal Thirst's arena.
